description_0: A close-up view of a car dashboard screen showing video footage from the side mirrors. The car is going through a carwash, and the screen is split into the vertical panes. Both of the panes are showing hazy views, and along with that the pane on the right is showing a bright green colored light. The pane on the left is a white and gray color, and in between both of the panes is a small depiction of a silver car towards the bottom. The cars front windshield can be seen behind the screen, it is covered in white and gray colored soap. Underneath the dashboard screen is a black air conditioning vent, and in between the vents is a red hazard light button.
description_1: A medium close up shot of the entertainment screen on the inside of a vehicle displaying its rear view camera as it sits inside a drive-through car wash. The image on the review camera is of a dark vehicle approaching the entrance to the drive-through car wash. The dark ground of the car wash covered with water and soap is also visible in the rear view display. The right side of the entertainment screen shows a diagram of a car with green and yellow line showing the distance of objects around the vehicle. The red double triangle emergency signal decal is visible on the black button below the entertainment screen. The brown leather dashboard with wood grain trim surrounds the screen. Wet soap suds are visible running down the windshield in the background, causing completely blurred views out. Daytime.
